author: siladu
content: <@199561711278227457> <@412614104222531604> are there more mainnet shadow forks planned for Shanghai?

author: parithosh
content: I can spin one more up, but is there a specific test we want to run or would it be a sanity check with mainnet releases?

author: siladu
content: for us it would just be an extra release stability check. The shadow fork schedule may be pertinent for choosing the real fork schedule on ACDE too.
